item.description:
Every year we award the Robert Austin Memorial Scholarship to a deserving high school senior. This year we are having an auction to support the scholarship program. So come and enjoy the proceedings. Bid on an item or service, or, even better, donate an item or service. For instance, frequent flyer miles, PC help, timeshare weeks and/or weekends and dinners with your Beanstalk friends are items that have been sold in the past. 

BYOB and a dish to share. The grill will be going if you want to bring food to grill.

Let Marie know if you're interested in donating something and she will get you in touch with the person coordinating the donations.

Directions furnished on request when you RSVP.
item.name: BBTC Scholarship Benefit Auction at Kay & Karl's
